metadata.title: USN-6596-1 -- Apache::Session::LDAP vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Apache::Session::LDAP incorrectly handled invalid X.509 certificates. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted invalid X.509 certificate, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform spoofing and obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6596-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache-session-ldap-perl - 0.4-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1 No subscription required
